document_data.name: Worthless Flower
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Worthless Flower''' gang was a [[yakuza]] group in [[Nakamaru]] in [[Wa]] around [[1357 DR]].

The Worthless Flower's main business was gambling. They tried to control all gambling operations in the city and surrounding area, but their games were not overtly dishonest. Although the odds were in the yakuza's favor, others won enough that they would return. The Worthless Flower ran many gambling houses in the city separated by the status of its patrons, with some only for [[samurai]], some for merchants, and so on.

The Worthless Flower was organized like a family with the boss as the father of his underlings. Among its important rules were secrecy, loyalty to the [[Wa-an dictionary#O|''oyabun,'']] and the banning of theft and other petty crimes. The Worthless Flower were officially recognized by city's authorities.
